players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Keep an eye on Alice; she seems suspicious."
You: "Bob, I think you're the mafioso. Let's get Diana to investigate your alibi."
Diana: "I believe Alice is the mafioso. Her behavior seems suspicious and she's trying to deflect attention from herself."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
